course_description: CHEM 203 will focus on the chemistry of organic and organometallic compounds; specifically how the molecular orbital theory can be used to predict structure and properties. This course covers kinetics, mechanisms, and catalysis.
prerequisites: CHEM 202 or CHEM_OX 202 or CHEM 202Z or CHEM 221 or CHEM_OX 221 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
